channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- External Media
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- External Media

item.title: CVE-2022-3832|2024-08-03T01:20:58.300Z -- unknown -- external%20media
item.description: The External Media WordPress plugin before 1.0.36 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
